meta.title: {propertyName} availability on {platform} | Binbang
meta.description: See the latest availability trend, price range, and alternatives for {propertyName} in {location}.
meta.ogDescription: Availability and price trend for {propertyName} on {platform}. Create an alert to get notified instantly.
meta.descriptionWithData: {propertyName} in {location}, recent booking rate {openRate}{trend}. Average price {avgPrice}. Get availability alerts

list.metaDescription: Browse recently observed availability and prices across public listings in one place.
list.metaOgDescription: Explore public availability snapshots from Binbang and open each listing for detailed trends.
list.heading: Public availability list
list.subheading: Check recently observed listings by platform, then open each detail page for open-rate and price trends.
list.empty: No public availability data yet. Please check again after the worker snapshot runs.

hero.summary: Recent booking trend for {location}. Current open rate: {openRate}.

trend.notEnoughHistory: Need one more snapshot for trend

prediction.title: Availability prediction
prediction.noData: Not enough data for predictions yet.

alternatives.title: Alternative properties nearby
alternatives.empty: No alternatives in the same area yet.

cta.title: Get notified as soon as a room opens
cta.description: Create a free Binbang account and receive vacancy alerts without refreshing booking pages.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: How is the availability trend for {propertyName} calculated?
faq.a1: Binbang aggregates recent check results from public booking pages on {platform}, then shows the open-rate trend as a daily snapshot.
faq.q2: Can price and availability change in real time?
faq.a2: Yes. Booking platforms can update room inventory and prices at any time, so use this page as a trend reference and set an alert for immediate updates.
faq.q3: Do I need to pay to create alerts?
faq.a3: You can start with a free plan and upgrade only when you need faster checks or more monitored listings.

region.metaDescription: {propertyCount} {platform} properties in {region}, average booking rate {avgOpenRate}. Check regional price ranges and availability trends.
region.subtitle: Availability status for {propertyCount} properties available on {platform}.

cta.title: Get Alerts for Your Desired Property
cta.description: Now that you have checked regional statistics, register your property of interest and receive alerts as soon as vacancies become available.
